result.eng: You were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ga: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.html: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí tú in ainm teaċt leaṫuair an ċloig ó ẛinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoi

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: Between five and half past five.
